title: Bowl, 1820–30
description: round bowl with large turned-over rim on stem with 2 knops; high stepped square base with faceting cut around circular section top; sides of bowl cut with band of small diamonds, row of facets above and below, turned- over rim has small diamonds band and row of narrow fluting, star cut on bottom

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, 1820–30.
1820–30. Glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-217.
